BBEX3.A.KZT.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Kazakhstan / USD 1 = KZT ... (middle)

General: The tenge was introduced as legal tender with effect from 15 November 1993. The currency conversion from rouble to the tenge occurred at the rate of RUR 500 = KZT 1; the tenge has been the sole legal tender since 18 November 1993. Exchange rate as of 15 November 1993: USD 1 = KZT 4.70.
Source: National Bank of Kazakhstan, Almaty.
Methodology: Until 2000, calculated on the basis of month-end rates, and from 2001 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.

Comment on 2009: On 5 February 2009, the tenge was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates.  4 February 2009: USD 1 = KZT 122,32  5 February 2009: USD 1 = KZT 143,98.  Calculated devaluation: 15.0%.
